overview: Dave Elchoness is the CEO of Tagwhat. Dave practiced law and served as a Fortune 200 executive before moving into emerging social technologies. A recognized innovator in virtual worlds and augmented reality, Dave has contributed to reports by Forrester Research, BusinessWeek, and T + D Magazine, among others. An accomplished speaker, he has addressed groups as diverse as the ION Game Conference, the American Bar Association, ASTD, and SIIA. Dave is a graduate of Rutgers College and the University of Pennsylvania Law School, where he served as Editor in Chief of the Journal of International Economic Law. Dave is based in Boulder, Colorado.
